summary: Test suite for the ACME client implementation, covering low‑level network interactions, higher‑level protocol operations (account creation, order handling, authorization polling, challenge processing, revocation) and error handling using both real and mocked HTTP responses.
business_intent: Validate that the ACME client behaves correctly and robustly in all stages of automated certificate issuance, ensuring compliance with the ACME protocol and reliable integration with certificate authorities.
